mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (email, name, teltype, mobile, pwd, jumina, sex, utype, regdate) values (#{email}, #{name}, #{teltype}, #{mobile}, #{pwd}, #{jumina}, #{sex}, #{utype}, sysdate)
mapper.update: update userinfo set name = #{name}, teltype = #{teltype}, mobile = #{mobile}, jumina = #{jumina}, sex = #{sex} where email = #{id}
